DOC.brief_title: A Study Assess Effect Glucose Control Safety Tolerability LY2148568 In Japanese Patients With Type 2 Diabetes
DOC.criteria: Diagnosed type 2 diabetes . Have body weight > =50 kg . Have receive treatment within last 30 day drug receive regulatory approval indication time study entry . Have participate study previously , study use exenatide GLP1 analog . Are treat exogenous insulin within 3 month screen . Are continuously treat follow excluded medication within 3 month screen ( 7 day per 1 month ) : *drugs directly affect gastrointestinal motility , include Nauzelin® ( domperidone ) , Primperan®/Terperan® ( metoclopramide ) , Ganaton® ( itopride ) , Acenalin® ( cisapride ) , Gasmotin® ( mosapride ) , Cerekinon® ( trimebutine ) .
